name: DERMOTIC
indications: dermotic ® oil corticosteroid indicated topical treatment chronic eczematous external otitis adults pediatric patients 2 years age older . ( 1 )
contraindications: dermotic oil otic . oral , ophthalmic , intravaginal . apply dermotic oil affected ear using supplied ear dropper . apply , tilt head one side ear facing . gently pull ear lobe backward upward apply 5 drops dermotic oil ear . keep head tilted minute allow dermotic oil penetrate lower ear canal . gently pat excess material dripping ear using clean cotton ball . follow instructions twice day 7 14 days . discontinue dermotic oil control disease achieved within 2 weeks , contact healthcare provider improvement seen within 2 weeks . face , axillae , groin unless directed healthcare provider . apply intertriginous areas due increased risk local [ ( 6 ) ( 8.4 ) ] .
warningsAndPrecautions: dermotic oil ( fluocinolone acetonide oil ) 0.01 % ear drops supplied bottles containing 20 ml , ( dropper included ) ( ndc # 68791-103-20 ) .
indications_original: DERMOTIC ® OIL is a corticosteroid indicated for the topical treatment of chronic eczematous external otitis in adults and pediatric patients 2 years of age and older. ( 1 )
contraindications_original:
DERMOTIC OIL is for otic administration only. Not for oral, ophthalmic, or intravaginal use.
                  Apply DERMOTIC OIL into the affected ear using the supplied ear dropper. To apply, tilt head to one side so that the ear is facing up. Then gently pull the ear lobe backward and upward and apply 5 drops of DERMOTIC OIL into the ear. Keep head tilted for about a minute to allow DERMOTIC OIL to penetrate lower into the ear canal. Gently pat excess material dripping out of the ear using a clean cotton ball. Follow these instructions twice each day for 7 to 14 days.
                  Discontinue DERMOTIC OIL when control of disease is achieved within 2 weeks, or contact the healthcare provider if no improvement is seen within 2 weeks.
                  Do not use on the face, axillae, or groin unless directed by the healthcare provider. Do not apply to intertriginous areas due to the increased risk of local adverse reactions [see Adverse Reactions (6) and Use in Specific Populations (8.4)].
warningsAndPrecautions_original: DERMOTIC OIL (fluocinolone acetonide oil) 0.01% ear drops is supplied in bottles containing 20 mL, (dropper included) (NDC # 68791-103-20).
